alert.note: Alert for Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 13 at 2:30AM MST until December 13 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph this evening. * WHERE...Rock Springs and Green River and Flaming Gorge. * WHEN...Until 11 PM Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, including on Interstate 80. Blowing and drifting of snow are possible with limited visibility at times especially this evening as west winds increase.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River
